name: BINKY IV: Return of Binky
description:
If you have the time, please read "onMasterSlaveAndGodotDevelopers" in txt or pdf formats

The fourth in the award winning BINKY Series.

After seven months of development, the BINKY team have created an exciting experience. Watch as BINKY ventures into the third dimension.

Developer interview:

developer 1: our publisher has paid for an expensive computer so that...

developer 2: so that BINKY is now in the third dimension! [laughs]

developer 1: it was a good investment

Controls: WASD - movement Arrow Keys - movement
